about_the_game:
Welcome to RushLane, an adrenaline-pumping, high-speed racing game set on the scenic forest roads! Take control of your car and navigate through the twists and turns while avoiding oncoming traffic and collecting points to unlock new vehicles.

Key Features:

Intuitive keyboard controls: Use the left and right arrow keys to steer and dodge vehicles.
Collect points: Grab points scattered across the road to unlock new and exciting cars.
Boost your speed: Press the spacebar for a temporary speed boost, but use it wisely!
Stunning forest road scenery: Immerse yourself in the beautiful and challenging environment.
Multiple vehicles to unlock: Collect points and unlock a variety of cars with unique features.
Experience the thrill of RushLane and become the master of the forest roads!

name: RushLane

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: i5
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
